Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Has antifungal activity against Trichophyton rubrum. Blocks voltage-dependent N-type calcium channels (Cav2.2 / CACNA1B).
Sequence Information.Tissue specificity: Highly expressed in the fat body.
Sequence Information.Developmental stage: Produced throughout adult diapause, and to a minor extent in pupae, but not in eggs, larvae, or post-diapausing adults. Inhibition of DSP expression does not affect the onset or maintenance of diapause, indicating that the expression of DSP accompanies but does not play a direct role in the induction or maintenance of diapause.

Literature.Title: A specific peptide produced during adult diapause of the leaf beetle, Gastrophysa atrocyanea Moschulsky (Coleoptara Chrysomelidae)
Literature.Author: Tanaka H et al. Suzuki K

Literature.Title: Insect diapause-specific peptide from the leaf beetle has consensus with a putative iridovirus peptide.
